body: Barack Obama’s campaign adopted data but Hillary Clinton’s campaign has been molded by data from birth.
author: Alex Tabarrok

_childDocuments_.author: Todd
_childDocuments_.text: Clinton got out data-ed and out organized in 2008 by Obama. She seems at least to learn over time, and apply the lessons learned to the real world.

_childDocuments_.author: The Other Jim
_childDocuments_.text: No, she lost because (1) she is thoroughly detested person and (2) the DNC decided Obama should therefore win.

title: The Irony of Hillary Clinton’s Data Analytics
